title: The Clash (rugby union)
text:
The Clash is an annual <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> match hosted by <a href="Bath%20Rugby">Bath Rugby</a> around Easter time each year. It is one of Bath's regular home matches in <a href="Premiership%20Rugby">Premiership Rugby</a> but it is moved from their usual home ground at the <a href="Recreation%20Ground%20%28Bath%29">Recreation Ground</a> in <a href="Bath%2C%20Somerset">Bath</a> (14,500 capacity) to the much larger <a href="Twickenham%20Stadium">Twickenham Stadium</a> in London (82,000 seats).
There are other high-profile matches in London between Premiership Rugby clubs at other times, particularly the <a href="London%20Double%20Header">London Double Header</a> and the <a href="The%20Big%20Game%20%28rugby%29">Big Game</a> (also at Twickenham) and <a href="Saracens%20F.C.">Saracens'</a> European or Premiership games at <a href="Wembley%20Stadium">Wembley Stadium</a>, <a href="London%20Stadium">London Stadium</a> and <a href="Tottenham%20Hotspur%20Stadium">Tottenham Hotspur Stadium</a>.
The 2020 match against <a href="Wasps%20RFC">Wasps</a> was rescheduled and moved to The Rec as a result of the <a href="COVID-19%20pandemic">COVID-19 pandemic</a>.
